item.description:
Since some of our members suggested this might be a fun thing to do, I decided to see if we get response for a wine tasting. The place itself is totally lovely and surrounded by wonderful countryside. We could also take a ramble around the vineyard if the weather is good.

"A full flight wine tasting is $10 per person; it includes our classic and limited production wines, and the glass may be kept as a souvenir. We also have a $5 tasting available for a taste of any 5 wines (excluding Pontefract wine) and the glass may be kept as a souvenir as well.
You may take a self-guided walk into the vineyard and enjoy the spectacular view at the top, which overlooks a portion of Connecticut, Massachusetts and Rhode Island.


The website of Sharpe Hill is:
www.sharpehill.com
